items.summary: Fix the meetup location lookup flow so that the entered meetup code is actually used to validate the fetched location, instead of using the locally stored share code.
Improve meetup lookup UX and error handling: validate Principal ID format before lookup, show clear inline errors, and ensure lookupCode is required for lookup.

Refine the location result panel to make the found meetup location easier to use: show last-updated time clearly, provide a one-click Google Maps link, and provide a copy-to-clipboard action for coordinates and/or the Maps URL.

Refine the sharing status panel to better communicate current state: show a clear active/inactive indicator, show last successful update time, and show a clear error state if periodic updates fail (including stopping sharing if updates fail).
